title: Funding for Handong U visit to Calvin
text:
This is an attempt to enumerate who is paying or what.







Item
funding source




Flights
Handong U


Prince CC (and breakfast)
DVI


Lunches on Sat/Sun



Dinners on Sat/Sun



Lunches Mon-Fri (dining hall)



Dinner Monday



Dinner Tuesday
SCIO (pending confirmation from Arlene)


Dinner Wednesday



Lunch/refrheshments Wed
Vos


Dinner Thursday
SCIO (pending confirmation from Arlene) or Vos


Dinner Friday



Excursions (if any)





Funding Sources

DVI
SCIO – for expenses related to bring FEN people to talk students
Vos – must relate to faculty development and involve Math/Stat
Math/Stat research overhead
Math/Stat “department fund”
Collaboration grant – funds available for post workshop dinner that we haven’t used yet
Other?
